Employee engagement survey template

# Employee engagement survey template

Get the bigger picture to improve your business where it counts

[Use this template](https://admin.typeform.com/signup/?redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fadmin.typeform.com%2Fform%2Ftemplate%2FqTbeLqwR%3Fsection%3Dcreate)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6718da5ecf694c9af0e8d5d7/677f9e36e308c1401828f328_673b6c93a41f7fd401ddd3b0_employee-engagement-survey-template-hero.webp)

Preview template

Employee Engagement Survey (2025)

Powered by Typeform

![](https://images.typeform.com/images/2jcaULmDuEV5/image/default)

## What's it like working here?

We're always looking to improve your work experience. Let us know what we're doing right and if anything grinds your gears.

Takes 2 minutes

Give feedback

press **Enter â†µ**

## Employee engagement survey template

Works great on every device.

[Start with this template](https://admin.typeform.com/signup/?redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fadmin.typeform.com%2Fform%2Ftemplate%2FqTbeLqwR%3Fsection%3Dcreate)

## With Typeform, you can â€¨customize everything

### Branding

Change text, colors, and even logos to match the look and feel of your brand. Then embed forms smoothly onto web and email.

### Experience

Make forms feel effortless to fill out. Pace questions, call people by their name, and adapt the flow based on the data they share.

### Integrations

Stay efficient by connecting forms to your workflow. Typeform integrates with 300+ tools including Slack, Zapier, and HubSpot.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ffe2174aa8e8d5661c2708/671a8121cfab40f53733710e_3e2ca1b7c4134bff047e46aaab0c9d28_b2c%20branding.webp)

primary.reasoning: Button #1 has a dark background color (#2A222B) and action-oriented text ('Start with this template'), making it the primary CTA. It stands out as a strong call-to-action compared to other buttons.

secondary.reasoning: Button #4 has a white background (#FFFFFF) and is less prominent, making it suitable as a secondary button. It is different from the primary button's color, fulfilling the requirement for a secondary action.
